answers.answer: I am not  a DR. I am only a patient. I saw your post and felt so bad for you. I had MRI in Sept and mine said on differential possible MS or vasculitis. It has taken me months for them to rule out brain tumor, as they had to wait to do another MRI etc. I am facing alot of other tests. This can be a long process , i didn't know it at the time. What does you neuro or other DR say? Youw ill se eend of Feb i am sure you will have more tests. MY MRI of brain was diff from yours, i had two spots larger than your , and enhancment showed mass effect . But my spots are not as prominent now, thank g.  good luck K
What is your age group? Strokes can happen in Utero.

question: Hi I posted before and saw some errors.  Here goes  I have short term memory loss, burning sensation on right side of head, muscle and joint pain.  MRI report as follows:  There are some prominent perivascular spaces present 11mm perivascular space in the region of the right basal ganglia.  This follows CSF density on all sequences, including flair imaging and actually  contain a small vessel within it.  There are two small foci of increased T2 weighted signal  within the right anterior centrum semi ovale.States does not have apperance of demyleinating diesease.  Could potentially represent nonspecific ishemic chnges, but not usual to see in this age group.  Potentiating factor such as migranes, hypertension, diabetes or vasculitis could augment this.WHAT DOES THIS MEAN????????I do not have any of the above possibly vascultis?  PLEASE let me know all suggestion, thoughts are so much appreciated.  I am a wreck and I can't see a neruologist until the end of February.  THANKS SOOO MUCH
title: MRI results not understood any HELP?
